metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25727 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In phpMyAdmin before 4.9.11 and 5.x before 5.2.1, an authenticated user can trigger XSS by uploading a crafted .sql file through the drag-and-drop interface.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
